page.title: 09 THE IMPERIAL HOTEL STAFF
page.content: Mr. Hobbs has a{restaurant}in his hotel and also serves{barmeals}.He has got seven people working in the kitchen including two{chefs}.The Head chef begins work at 7.30 a.m.and is responsible for the ordering and preparation of the day's food.On most days the kitchen prepares about 220 meals. At 9.30.a.m. the head{barman begins work and Mr. Hobbs makes him in charge of ordering the drinks and goods sold at the bars. The total staff behind the bar is 5 people. Throughout the day Mr. Hobbs is on duty seeing that everything runs well and attends to any problems that may arise. At midnight he closes the bars and locks the doors and goes to bed at about 12.30 a.m. BY{SIMON LE RAY.
